arts.ttl: Mason Greenwood 'is being encouraged to consider SUING Man United' on the back of Benjamin Mendy winning unpaid wages in battle with Man City
arts.sum: Mendy won his legal battle against former club City for the majority of his £11million in unpaid wages while he faced rape charges. Mendy was cleared of raping a woman at his £4m mansion.

arts.ttl: ‘If I’m the problem I’m ready to leave’ – Roberto De Zerbi threatens to quit Marseille after shock defeat
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille were shocked earlier this evening when they were soundly beaten 3-1 by AJ Auxerre at the Stade Vélodrome. Marseille let in an early goal in the 10th…

arts.ttl: Another painful home defeat for Marseille as Auxerre wins 3-1 in French league
arts.sum: Roberto de Zerbi’s team was whistled and jeered by the frustrated home fans, with some Auxerre players even attempting to console the likes of Marseille midfielder Adrien Rabiot. Marseille slumped to its second successive French league loss at home when Auxerre grabbed a 3-1 win at the Stade Vélodrome on Friday.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Marseille 1-3 Auxerre: Stade Vélodrome shocked by first-half rout
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 11, 08/11/24 Olympique de Marseille were hoping to put some distance between them and their last home result where they lost 3-0 to Paris Saint-Germain in…

arts.ttl: Marseille rally to help victims of Spanish floods during Auxerre fixture
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille have announced their support for the victims of the Spanish floods, in particular, those of the Valencian region with an initiative that will take place during the…

arts.ttl: ‘I know the value of the armband’ – Pierre-Emile Højberg on captaining Marseille
arts.sum: In an interview with L’Équipe, Tottenham loanee Pierre-Emile Højberg (29) discussed the characteristics that make him a natural leader and how it felt to captain Olympique de Marseille despite only being…

arts.ttl: Auxerre predicted XI v Marseille: In-form Bournemouth loanee to start
arts.sum: In-former Bournemouth loanee Hamed Traoré will start for AJ Auxerre as they prepare to face Olympique de Marseille at the Vélodrome on Friday evening. Traoré, who joined in the summer,…

arts.ttl: Marseille predicted XI v Auxerre: Neal Maupay and Jonathan Rowe to start
arts.sum: Having impressed last week during the 2-1 win over FC Nantes, Jonathan Rowe and Neal Maupay are set to retain their starting spots in the Olympique de Marseille line-up when…

Marseille face an in-form Auxerre side at the Vélodrome after Les Olympiens got back to winning ways against Nantes last weekend. Marseille have won each of their last 3 Ligue 1 matches against Auxe...

arts.ttl: ‘The hierarchy remains the same’ – Roberto De Zerbi trusts in Elye Wahi despite Neal Maupay’s performances
arts.sum: Roberto De Zerbi has sent Elye Wahi (21) a message of support in today’s press conference ahead of the match against AJ Auxerre. The misfiring striker has struggled to impress…
